name: Vertices!
description:
Vertices is a simple game, where you have 20 seconds to click on the shapes with the fewest vertices, or sides. 

Can you clear 10 shapes before the time runs out? What about 20?! More?!?!

This game was made for the TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam 2020, as my first foray into minigames.

Credits:

Fonts, icons and sound effects come courtesy of Kenney Game Assets. Music is from Subspace Audio, via Open Game Art.

All coding and shoddy shapes are my fault.

Note: If you play the web version of this game, the game window will be slightly squished unless your browser window is in a 1280x720 aspect ratio. For best results, maximise your browser.
